Investor_18.name: Isabella Costa
Investor_18.content: Isabella Costa has further solidified her reputation as a highly trustworthy and socially conscious investor. Throughout the investment process, she actively engaged with the trustee, demonstrating transparency and a commitment to fairness, which has resulted in favorable profit distributions. Her collaborative approach has maximized her returns and showcased her dedication to mutual success, reinforcing her status as an exemplary investor.

Trustee_13.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13.content: Emma has demonstrated a commendable level of integrity and fairness throughout the investment process. By exceeding the expectations set in the allocation plan to benefit her investor, she has successfully positioned herself as a trustworthy and competent trustee. Her actions have positively impacted her reputation and laid a foundation for future engagements.

Trustee_19.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19.content: Mateo Garcia has exhibited honorable behavior as a trustee, demonstrating honesty and the ability to prioritize the investor's interests during the investment process. While the profit distribution was slightly less than initially proposed, his integrity in the situation ultimately resulted in a more favorable outcome for the investor, helping to establish a solid foundation for a positive reputation as a trustworthy and pro-social trustee.
